DelaySender
AdvancedSendersEndpoint
Sender that sleeps for a specified time, which defaults to 5000 msecs. Useful for testing purposes.

Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
delayTime	number	5000 [ms]
The time in milliseconds the thread will be put to sleep
AbstractSender
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
Name of the sender
active	text	-
If defined and empty or false, then this element and all its children are ignored
